publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1050.1 John Swinburne: Abolition of Council Tax-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1050) in the name of Fergus Ewing, insert at end "and, until the present system of local government finance is replaced with a fairer tax, calls upon local authorities to cap council tax increases for pensioners in line with the increase in their state pension."
